Welcome to the alphabet! \n\n
Select a letter to learn an object that starts with that letter.
Shake your device to reveal the object!
Count the objects from one to ten.

Listen to nursery rhymes! \n\n
Select a song and sing together with the lyrics on-screen
Sing together with the lyrics on-screen. Use the button below to play and pause the music.

This application is part of a project for Mobile Development subject at STI College Novaliches.
